spells.name: Blinding Flash
spells.description: Creates a sudden burst of intense white light, temporarily blinding everyone in a 10 ft radius. Victims are blinded for 1-4 melees, -5 to strike, -10 to parry and dodge; chance of falling 50% every 10 ft. Does not affect bionic/cybernetic eyes.

spells.name: Cloud of Smoke
spells.description: Creates a dense black smoke cloud (max 30 ft x 30 ft x 30 ft) up to 90 ft away. Victims inside see only 3 ft, suffer -5 to strike/parry/dodge.

spells.name: Death Trance
spells.description: Induces a trance making the caster appear dead (no breathing, pulse, heartbeat). The caster is helpless and cannot act; magic can be canceled at will.

spells.name: Globe of Daylight
spells.range: Near self or up to 30 ft
spells.description: Creates a small sphere of true daylight, lighting 12 ft per caster level. Wards off vampires. Globe may be moved mentally up to 30 ft; max travel speed equals speed attribute 12.

spells.name: See Aura
spells.description: Reveals auras of organic and inorganic things: approximate experience level, presence of magic or psychic abilities, P.P.E. level, possession, or unusual aberrations. Cannot determine alignment.

spells.name: See the Invisible
spells.description: Allows caster to see invisible forces, objects, and creatures (ghosts, entities, astral bodies).

spells.name: Sense Evil
spells.description: Detects presence and approximate number/intensity of supernatural evil within 90 ft; can localize to rooms/objects/people. Human evil less distinct.

spells.name: Sense Magic
spells.description: Detects presence and relative proximity of magic (like a Geiger counter); indicates if an object or person is enchanted.

spells.name: Thunderclap
spells.description: Produces a booming clap of thunder audible up to a mile, startling and creating a horror factor; grants caster +5 initiative, +1 to strike/parry/dodge.
